Verses: 1 un Nesar Enge Ponaar? Sthreegalil Roobavadhiye! Un Nesar Evvidam Poivittaar? Unnodekooda Naangalum Avaraith Theduvom.
2 thottangalil Meyavum, Leelipushpangalaik Koiyavum, En Nesar Thamadhu Thottaththukkum Kandhavarkkap Paaththigalukkum Ponaar.
3 naan En Nesarudaiyaval, En Nesar Ennudaiyavar; Avar Leelipushpangalukkulle Meygiraar.
4 en Piriyame! Nee Thirsaavaippol Sowndhariyamum, Erusalemaippol Vadivamum, Kodigal Parakkum Padaiyaippol Kediyumaanaval.
5 un Kangalai Ennaivittuth Thiruppu, Avaigal Ennai Vendradhu; Un Alagabaaram Keeleyaadh Malaiyile Thazhaimeyum Vellaattu Mandhaiyaippolirukkiradhu.
6 un Parkal Kulippaattappattuk Karaiyerugiravaigalum Ondraanaalum Maladaayiraamal Rattaik Kuttiyeendravaigalumaana Aattumandhaiyaippolirukkiradhu.
7 un Mukkaattin Naduve Un Kannangal Vediththa Maadhalampazham Polirukkiradhu.
8 raajasthreegal Arubadhuperum, Marumanaiyaattigal Enbadhuperumundu; Kanniyarukkuth Thogaiyillai.

9 en Puraavo, En Uththamiyo Oruththiye; Aval Than Thaaikku Ore Pillai; Aval Thannaip Petravalukku Arumaiyaanaval; Kumaaraththigal Avalaik Kandu, Avalai Vaazhththinaargal; Raajasthreegalum Marumanaiyaattigalum Avalaip Potrinaargal.
10 sandhiranaippol Azhagum, Sooriyanaippol Pragaasamum, Kodigal Parakkum Padaiyaippol Kediyumullavalaai, Arunodhayampol Udhikkira Ival Yaar?
11 pallaththaakkile Pazhuththa Kanigalaip Paarkkavum, Dhraatchachchedigal Thulirvittu, Maadhalanchedigal Pooththadhaa Endru Ariyavum, Vaadhumaith Thottaththukkup Ponen.
12 ninaiyaadhadhukkumunne En Aaththumaa Ennai Amminadhaabin Radhangalukku Oppaakkitru.

13 thirumbivaa, Thirumbivaa, Soolamiththiye! Naangal Unnaip Paarkkumpadikku, Thirumbivaa, Thirumbivaa. Soolamiththiyil Neengal Ennaththaip Paarkkireergal? Aval Irandu Senaiyin Koottaththukku Samaanamaanaval.
